definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Huaihua city is an important forestry area in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 懷化市是湖南省的重點林區。

sentences.english: The third case is a 16 year old male from Huaihua City, Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 第三例爲一名來自湖南省懷化市的16歲男子。
